entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 12:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 5.9°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
